title: Please do something about full tank assassins
body: Assassin champs such as fizz and ekko shouldn't be able to build full tank and still do so much damage its ridiculous

replies.body: It's not the other player's fault if you don't counter build or play unsafely like those players who think kiting is cowardly then feed all game thinking they're playing honorably. LOL, if you follow metas too hard then get countered and assume somebody's going to play the meta builds and then not check their build for 12 minutes or something then don't blame others -.-
Not blaming the players I'm blaming Riot for allowing this to happen in their game
Letting new people play or not having an item build tutorial? :l

You have a point, Riot need to make their champions playable in only a couple of ways, not 15 different variants.

But given that they can build that way, you can also counter build that way. Thought with that being said, it is not easy to counter build one person and expect to get a good result, the other players will simply get on top of you.

Although, with THAT being said, if you can build how ever the hell you wish and force your laner, or the enemy team to counter just you, than unless your team are morons, you should deserve your win.
Lol at this thread when Lee Sin has been doing Tank Assassin since Noah's flood.

I agree, and full tank champs like Voli should't be able to melt other champs instantly.

**Assassins are easy to kill champions that are easy to kill other champions with.**

**Tanks are hard to kill champions that are hard to kill other champions with.**

Please keep it that way!
Adapt. =/ That's what I freaking did with how some players behave. http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/y3y9Hcgn-aram-team-serious-aram-players-only?comment=0003

Fizz has a couple nerfs tomorrow coming in.
Ekko got nerfed a couple patches ago and riot are "waiting to see its impact"

But I agree 100%. Tank Akali too. complete bullshit.
Agreed. Last game was a disaster with tank fizz absolutely destroying, even after me going 14-3 on Lucian. When is the patch applied?
